blogs.title: Optimizing Database Queries with Indexing Strategies
blogs.excerpt: Deep dive into database indexing strategies to dramatically improve query performance and reduce response times in production applications.
blogs.author: Code Master

code.snippet:
-- Create composite index for faster queries
CREATE INDEX idx_users_email_status 
ON users(email, status) 
WHERE status = 'active';

-- Analyze query performance
EXPLAIN ANALYZE
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.id) as order_count
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
WHERE u.status = 'active'
GROUP BY u.id, u.name
HAVING COUNT(o.id) > 5;

blogs.author: Code Master

code.snippet:
# Kubernetes Deployment Configuration
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-service
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api
        image: myapp/api:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        env:
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: db-secret
              key: url
